meanings.definition: A type of worm that feeds on the leaves of trees.
meanings.sent1: The cankerworms crawled slowly on the tree leaves.
meanings.sent2: The arborist found cankerworms damaging the oak tree.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel blamed the missing leaves on the cankerworms.
meanings.sent4: The cankerworms devoured the foliage like tiny leaf-eating machines.
meanings.sent5: The cankerworms left a trail of destruction in their leafy feast.

meanings.definition: To be infested or plagued by cankerworms.
meanings.sent1: The forest was cankerworms-infested, causing concern among the locals.
meanings.sent2: The orchard owner battled with being cankerworms-ridden every spring.
meanings.sent3: The picnic was almost ruined by a surprise visit from cankerworms.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was cankerworms-infested with worries, making it hard to focus.
meanings.sent5: The town felt cankerworms-plagued, struggling to keep the trees healthy.
